titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Deluges of rain. I went to the Episcopal Church, & heard a sermon which made me angry & melancholy, the first that such preaching should be offered in the pulpit, the last that it should be welcomed in the pew.
In the afternoon I wrote letters to Marion, Mary, and another of the Confirmation Boys.
